title: Replay Recording
body:
Hey
I recently watched my taliyah replay on my match history and was recording the things i did well on that game. After i was done recording from the recording button, Where did the video go? Appreciate the help... Thanks.

replies.body:
It went into your highlights folder, which can be found inside your **Documents** folder under *League of Legends*, then hop into your *highlights* folder. You can find all your recorded highlights here.

I hope this helped! ^.^
